description:
cmd/gc: correctly typecheck expression lists in returns.

Invalid return statements were accidentally compiling or
triggering internal errors.
Fixes issue 3044.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

I think you can close the issue.
I'm sure Ian will hit it when he pulls in this test case.
Thanks very much for the quick fix.
Gccgo is also affected, so maybe the issue should stay open.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=46f3a9f35a4a ***

cmd/gc: correctly typecheck expression lists in returns.

Invalid return statements were accidentally compiling or
triggering internal errors.
Fixes issue 3044.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev, remy

subject: code review 5673074: cmd/gc: correctly typecheck expression lists in returns.
